DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate usability Foresee Home device intermediate AMD patient .
DOC.brief_title: Age-Related Macular Degeneration ( AMD ) - Usability Study
DOC.detailed_description: The AMD usability study prospective , longitudinal , multi-center , observational study patient diagnose intermediate ( dry ) AMD ask doctor use ForeseeHomeTM device record natural progression AMD , include conversion dry wet stage .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Subjects diagnose intermediate AMD least one eye Visual Acuity ( VA ) habitual correction < 20/60 study eye Qualified clinic use device Ability speak , read understand instruction English Subjects ability comprehend sign inform consent/authorization Exclusion criterion Evidence macular disease AMD glaucoma study eye Presence significant medium opacity precludes clear view macular area identify study eye biomicroscopy Any nonmacular related ocular surgery perform within 3 month prior study entry target eye
